name: Fever Cabin
description:
"Five Nights at Freddy's meets COD Zombies" in this challenging horror shooter with pseudo puzzle elements that forces you to use your head and listen carefully.
Each night adds a new threat which you must overcome by keeping a steady head and not losing your patience.
Armed with only a pistol and flashlight, you must keep zombies and other horrors from the windows and barricades while managing your resources and trying to hold onto your sanity.
You must juggle the many tasks needed to survive all five nights while preparing for twists and turns.
Each night will leave you breathlessly shaking by the end.
